warezcdn.name: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco: Alma de Ouro
warezcdn.title: Saint Seiya: Soul of Gold

imdb.title: Saint Seiya: Soul of Gold
imdb.plot: As the Bronze Saints are fully engaged in an epic battle down in Ade's Kingdom, the Golden heroes come mysteriously back to life in Asgard where something ominous is happening.

episodes.title: Gold Legend, Revive!
episodes.plot: While the Bronze Saints are fully concentrated in an epic battle in the underworld, Kingdom of Hades, the Golden heroes return to life mysteriously in Asgard, where something sinister is happening.

episodes.title: The Secret of Yggdrasil Revealed!
episodes.plot: Aiolia had defeated Frodi after his Gold Cloth had evolved into a new form. However, a mysterious pattern reappeared on his body again, and he collapses to the ground. Lyfia runs around to find help for Aiolia, but soon collapses herself, too. When she wakes up, she finds herself with a young boy and Aries Mu, who carries the Cloth Box. Meanwhile, a guy was heading alone to the fighting arena in Asgard. His name was Taurus Aldebaran, and he too, was trying to find the reason to why he was given another life.

episodes.title: Gold vs. Gold: Clash of the Saints!
episodes.plot: Scorpio Miro finally faces off against one of the God Warriors, Surt. However, standing in his way is none other than Gold Saint Aquarius Camus. Meanwhile in town, Aiolia and Lyfia run into Cancer Deathmask on their quest for Yggdrasil.

episodes.title: The 7 God Warriors Assembled!
episodes.plot: When Miro's life is at stake under Surt's malicious scheme, there emerges the strongest Gold Saint of Athena - Gemini Saga. Meanwhile, Helena, whom Deathmask secretly fancies, falls for the ferocious God Warrior Fafner's offer for "medical treatment".

episodes.title: The Ultimate Power of the God Cloth
episodes.plot: Learning of the God Cloths' powers from Shaka, Mu telepathically tells Aiolia and Lyfia, who are headed to Yggdrasil, that its barrier can be broken using their God Cloths to raise their Cosmo to the limit to attack the 3 key points of the Great Root.

episodes.title: Enter the 7 Chambers of Yggdrasil
episodes.plot: The Gold Saints are lured into Yggdrasil by Andreas after breaking Fimbulwinter. Lyfia states the brewing evil can be stopped by destroying the statues in the 7 chambers. The Gold Saints advance with renewed resolve, while a change occurs in Lyfia.

episodes.title: Chaos! God Cloth VS God Cloth
episodes.plot: A showdown of Gold Saints vs. God Warriors in the 7 chambers starts at last. Taurus Aldebaran faces God Warrior Hercules yet again. Meanwhile, in the chamber of ice, Gold Saints Shura and Camus engage in an ultimate battle of God Cloth vs. God Cloth.

episodes.title: Baldr, the Man Chosen by God
episodes.plot: Shaka, the man closest to the gods, faces God Warrior Balder in the chamber of light. He lives up to his reputation, but Balder subdues him with immense power. Meanwhile, Deathmask takes Fafner to the gateway to the land of the dead to settle all scores.

episodes.title: Saga, the Unbreakable Bond of Brothers!
episodes.plot: Sigmund, determined to avenge his younger brother Siegfried, is brushed aside by the immense power of the "strongest" Gold Saint Saga. Meanwhile, in the chamber of the brave, a fierce battle continues between Aiolia and Frodi, when Lyfia steps in.

episodes.title: Clash: Aiolia vs. Andreas!
episodes.plot: Holding Lyfia's words close to heart, Aiolia finally faces Andreas. Andreas scornfully recounts how he manipulated Lyfia. Fuming with rage, Aiolia's immense Cosmo turns into a God Cloth. Meanwhile, Frodi is cornered by Utgardar's forceful swordplay.

episodes.title: Resurrection! Loki, the Evil God of Asgard
episodes.plot: The ultimate forbidden attack Athena Exclamation by Mu, Saga, and Dohko annihilates Andreas. However, the evil fruit continues to grow, swallowing the Gold Saints. While stripped of his Gold Cloth, Aiolia faces Loki with a burning Cosmo in his heart.

episodes.title: The Birth of the Sacred Treasure, the Gungnir Spear
episodes.plot: Empowered by his brother's determination, Lyfia's faith, and the Odin Robe, Aiolia, with Odin's sword and Draupnir in hand, faces off against Loki. The ultimate battle reaches its climax - Aiolia's fist vs. the Spear of Gungnir - who will take victory?

episodes.title: Let Our Feelings Be Conveyed! The Gold Legend Forever
episodes.plot: All 12 Gold Saints gather since the Wailing Wall. With the purpose of reviving on earth close at heart, they face the false god Loki who's armed with the Spear of Gungnir. However, the 12 Gold Saints are overpowered by the absolute power of god.
